name: Hopeless Heroes: Tap Attack
summary: The cute, Hopeless blobs are out of the cave, but they are in trouble again! Blob Town is under attack from an army of scary monsters. Blob heroes from around the world have answered the call to help - will you lead them? In this free clicker game, tap to attack the monsters and recruit blob heroes, collect gold, and click your way to be the most powerful blob in existence. The blobs escaped the cave, help them win back Blob Town!
